description: Metrics from telegraf stored in influxdb

panels.description: How long the system has been running for host $server
panels.title: UPTIME

panels.description: The cpu count for host $server
panels.title: CPU

panels.description: The total amount of memory for host $server
panels.title: RAM

panels.description: The total amount of disk space on rootFS for host $server
panels.title: DISK

panels.description: This gauge is representative for a single host
panels.title: CPU IDLE

targets.query: SELECT mean(load1) as load1,mean(load5) as load5,mean(load15) as load15 FROM "system" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), * ORDER BY asc
SELECT 100 - mean("usage_idle") AS "used" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$server$/ AND "cpu" != 'cpu-total')  AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "tag", "host", "cpu"

panels.description: This gauge is representative for a single host
panels.title: RAM USED

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

panels.description: This gauge is representative for a single host
panels.title: SWAP USED

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

panels.description: This gauge is representative for a single host
panels.title: ROOTFS USED

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) AS "total", mean(used) as "used" FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /$server$/ AND "path" = '/' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), "host", "path"

panels.description: This gauge is representative for a single host
panels.title: NFS USED

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

panels.title: Buffer Pool Mapped

panels.description: The Young Generation is where all new objects are allocated and aged. When the young generation fills up, this causes a minor garbage collection. Minor collections can be optimized assuming a high object mortality rate. A young generation full of dead objects is collected very quickly. Some surviving objects are aged and eventually move to the old generation.

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

panels.title: GC Young Generation

panels.description: The Old Generation is used to store long surviving objects. Typically, a threshold is set for young generation object and when that age is met, the object gets moved to the old generation. Eventually the old generation needs to be collected. This event is called a major garbage collection.

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

panels.title: LRU Moved Objects

panels.description: Least Recently Used Nuked Objects: Cumulative number of cached objects that Varnish has evicted from the cache because of a lack of space.

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc

panels.title: Objects

panels.description: Hits : Indicates the number of objects delivered to clients without fetching them from the backend. Hitpass:  	Counts how many times the hit-for-pass object has been hit, i.e., Varnish passes the request to the backend. Miss: Shows how many requested objects were fetched from the backend.

targets.query: SELECT mean(total) as total, mean(used) as used, mean(cached) as cached, mean(free) as free, mean(buffered) as buffered  FROM "mem" WHERE host =~ /$server$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval), host ORDER BY asc
